Document:
# Argocytes
A distant relatives of Xenos, Argocytes, are known throughout the sector for their ability to eat and digest almost anything from your friendly neighbor to reinforced plastitanium vault walls. Just like Xenos this species is well acclimated to the most hostile environments imaginable: neither the vacuum of space nor the extreme heat and pressure of a planet consumed by plasma fire can kill those creatures. Has fluorosulfuric acid for blood.
# Known variants ## "Slurva"
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health pool:[/color][/bold] Significantly below average[bold][bold][color=#a4885c]*[/color][/bold] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Primary damage types:[/color][/bold] [color=red]Blunt[/color] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistance profile:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] None
A pathetic creature, incapable of doing much. Yet. Better to kill it now, before it has a chance to mature. Underdeveloped teeth and jaws don't allow slurvas to consume any materials harder than bones.
[bold][color=#a4885c]*[/color][/bold] - [italic]an average human being is taken for a reference point.[/italic]
## "Barrier"
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health pool:[/color][/bold] Significantly below average[bold] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Primary damage types:[/color][/bold] [color=red]Blunt[/color] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistance profile:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] None
Next stage of slurva's life cycle. Still not capable of consuming anything harder than bones.
## "Skitter"
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health pool:[/color][/bold] Below average[bold] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Primary damage types:[/color][/bold] [color=red]Slash[/color] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistance profile:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] None
Slightly more mature and grown barrier. Still not capable of consuming anything harder than bones.
## "Swiper"
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health pool:[/color][/bold] Below average[bold] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Primary damage types:[/color][/bold] [color=red]Slash[/color] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistance profile:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] None
By this point jaws, teeth, and digestive tract of young argocyte are developed enough for it to be able to consume and digest soft metals.

# Missions targets ## Elimination
Eliminate large and dangerous creature - [color=#a4885c]leviathing[/color] within given time constraints to earn a monetary reward.
## Destruction
Destroy a certain amount of [color=#a4885c]argocyte eggs[/color] within given time constraints to earn a monetary reward.
